doc.field: Promotional Language and Philosophy for the Hendrick Institute
Promotional Language and Philosophy for the Hendrick Institute

These manuscripts consist of drafts and revisions to the language Susan L. Hendrick and the Hendrick Institute used for their promotional materials and to detail the school's philosophy to interested parents. The issues range from the approach to teaching "delicate children" to the location of the Institute and courses of study available. Throughout, these texts are often on the same pages as various lists of names, including parents, children, and staff.
